item.title: Friedrich Duerrenmatt's Plays and Books
item.description: Recently, I discovered a new author for myself: Friedrich Duerrenmatt. He was a Swiss author and dramatist in XX century. So far I red three of his books and quite enjoyed all of them: The Physicists. I recommend to read it in german, if possible. It is a satiric drama that reflects on the times of the Cold War. Apparently, this is one of the most played theater pieces in German speaking Switzerland, Germany and Austria.

item.title: Links & Books
item.description: Here is a collection of links and books that I ever found interesting and don’t want to forget. Computer Science Introduction to Algorithms by T. H. Cormen, C. E. Leiserson, R.L. Rivest, & C. Stein Clean Code by Robert C. Martin Deep Learning by Y.Goodfellow, Y Bengio & A. Courville Designing Data-Intensive Applications Missing Semester of Your CS Education algorithmsbook.com The Twelve-Factor App Data Science at the Command Line Design Patterns.
